articles.author: Alex Kalinauckas
articles.title: F1 Miami GP: Verstappen fends off Leclerc for pole again - Autosport
articles.description: Max Verstappen beat Charles Leclerc to take pole position for Formula 1’s 2024 Miami Grand Prix, with both drivers failing to set their best times on their final qualifying laps.
articles.content:
Verstappen posted a 1m27.241s to lead Leclerc by 0.141-seconds on the first runs in Q3, where they were trailed by Carlos Sainz in the other Ferrari.
On the final runs, although Verstappen set the s… [+2052 chars]
